Detailed Description

This class represents a request variable of both GET and POST type.
Author:
Bas van Gaalen
Since:
1.0

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Variable.__construct ( $  sValue = '',
$  sType = null 
)

Constructor sets the value and type of the variable. The Name component is in a hash (associative array) in the RequestVars class.

Parameters:
$sValue string Value.
$sType string Either GET or POST.
